title: Kyoto Animation: Hassou-hen (Imaginations)
synopsis: While waiting in a park for someone to arrive, a certain person's mind begins to wander: in daydreams and visions, they watch parts of their surroundings transform into the one they await as they descend into these fantasies.
related_anime: ['Kyoto Animation: Hoshi-hen', 'Kyoto Animation: Hana-hen', 'Kyoto Animation: Ikitaku Naru Omise-hen', 'Kyoto Animation: Ajisai-hen', 'Kyoto Animation: Meiji-hen', 'Kyoto Animation: Sora-hen', 'Kyoto Animation: Suiei-hen', 'Kyoto Animation: Kasa-hen', 'Kyoto Animation: Souzou-hen', 'Kyoto Animation: Megane-hen']
